testsuite.name: uc.seng301.petbattler.lab6.cucumber.RunCucumberTest

testcase.name: AC1 - A pet has a unique non-empty name, a strictly positive attack, and positive health stats.
AC1.1 - A pack has non-empty alphanumeric name
AC2 - A must pack have a unique name
AC3 - A pack must be able to store many pets
AC1 - I can draw a random pet that has a valid name, attack, health, and tier
AC2 - If I find a suitable pet, I can add the pet to my pack
AC3 - I can decide to ignore a pet and not add it to my pack
AC4 - A pack cannot contain the same pet twice

failure.message: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: Expected java.lang.IllegalArgumentException to be thrown, but nothing was thrown.

testcase.failure: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: Expected java.lang.IllegalArgumentException to be thrown, but nothing was thrown. at app//uc.seng301.petbattler.lab6.cucumber.step_definitions.DrawNewPetFeature.i_cannot_add_a_pet_with_the_same_name_in_the_pack_of(DrawNewPetFeature.java:118) at ✽.I cannot add a pet with the same name in the pack "My first pack" of "Alya"(classpath:uc/seng301/petbattler/lab6/cucumber/u3-add-pet.feature:28)
